titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the St. Mark's Episcopal Church, Paw Paw, Mich. records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

corpname.primary_name: St. Mark's Episcopal Church (Paw Paw, Mich.)

did.unittitle: St. Mark's Episcopal Church, Paw Paw, Mich. records

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.scopecontent: Record book, 1865-ca. 1950 (scattered dates) containing register of burials, marriages, baptisms, confirmations, and communicants, also vestry minutes (1865-1880s) and a few clippings and programs about the church. The collection also includes photographs of the church building and postcards of the church and of other Michigan Episcopal churches, clippings, and miscellaneous documents.

corpname.primary_name: St. Mark's Episcopal Church (Paw Paw, Mich.)
